Key Match Events: KL Rahul scored 55 runs off 35 balls
Hardik Pandya scored 71 runs off 30 balls
Cameron Green scored 61 runs off 30 balls
Australia won by 4 wickets with 4 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Cameron Green was awarded the Player of the Match award
Axar Patel was the CRICINFO's MVP with 133.39 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali, Chandigarh
Australia led the 3-match series 1-0 after this win
